summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue South, from Dawson Street to the south line of Columbia Heights 2nd Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 106533 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
